existing_features.title: Create a new authenticated "My Profile" page that displays the signed-in user’s Name and registered Email from the existing caller user profile, and also displays the user’s Internet Identity UID (principal).

Add a dedicated backend query method that returns a stable, deterministic "unique number" for the authenticated caller (derived from the caller principal), and display this number on the My Profile page labeled as "Unique Number".
Add navigation to the new My Profile page from the authenticated area (Dashboard header or dashboard page actions) and add a new hash route (e.g., "/profile") wired into the existing router.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add 'My Profile' page that displays registered email, name, and UID/unique number
